vsParam:
Ahhhh-hhaaaaa... so sleepy...
Wow, [px] you yawned so widely... Hmm...

Hey, it's only the morning and you're already slacking off!
As a student of the Academy, pull yourself together!

Ah, it's Hazel~
I am not a student~

That's "Miss President" to you.
Regardless of whether you are a student or not...

... as long as you are part of the Academy,
you are expected to hold yourself to the highest standards...

Wow, what a noise!
That voice... [px], should we go check it out?

Come on, students, gather round!
I, Silver Birch, am going to reveal my latest invention!

As I thought, Silver Birch Sensei is up to his old tricks again.
I wonder what it will be today...

Ahh... Uncle, another one of your talks...
I'm so embarrassed to be your niece...

Oh, that's right.
Silver Birch Sensei is Hazel's uncle.

Ehh... He might be a top-class researcher,
but he has almost no common sense...

Great, we've got a decent crowd. I'll begin.
This is my greatest invention yet...
"Space-Time Controller No.4".

Hello everyone, I am "Space-time Controller N°4"!
But please, just call me "Popy"!

Wow, it's amazing!
A machine that can speak!

Ahaha! It's capable of far more than just speech!
Popy can create a Space-time Distortion at will!

Well, just a small distortion. In other words, it can create a portal
to different worlds from which items can be retrieved.

That's Popy's function!
Of course, I took all necessary precautions regarding safety!

Uhh...
Uncle has made another one of his ridiculous inventions...

Wowowoo, that's impressive~
Silver Birch Sensei is really amazing~!!
Wah! I'd like to try using Popy as well!

Yes, yes!
That's right, that's right!

Ahh. Popy is all yours now.
Let the other students use it if necessary.

Huh...? Wait, what?!
Why should I?!

You're my niece, a relicology student familiar with machines,
and what's more, you're the President of the Student Union. Simple.

As such, make sure that Popy is put to good use
for everyone's sake.

Goodbye, Master~!
At your service, new Master Hazel!!

H-hold on! I don't want to be your master!
Uncle, get back here! Ahhh...

Hazel... I...
I'd really like to try it... try "Popy"...

Come back here! Wait! Wait!
I said, waaaiiittt!!!
